title: Reinsurance certificates and slips (treaty and facultative)
dataVerified: Ceding company, reinsurer, coverage terms, layers, premium, effective dates
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Certificate status (active/expired). Link to reinsurer/broker system (authorized parties, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents forged reinsurance slips. Domain binding verifies reinsurer/broker. Multi-billion dollar risk transfers. London/Bermuda market standard. Syndicate verification (Lloyd's). Prevents unauthorized reinsurance placements.
